select v.activityalias_ , v.businessstate_ , t1.id , t1.created_by , t1.creation_date , t1.last_updated_by , t1.last_update_date , t1.last_update_ip , t1.version , t1.order_number , t1.apply_id , t1.apply_dept , t1.telephone , t1.tdevice_name , t1.tdevice_code , t1.tdevice_model , t1.tdevice_num , t1.belong_model , t1.test_type , t1.test_nature , t1.test_condition , t1.support_tool , t1.order_start_time , t1.order_finish_time , t1.lab_device_id , t1.lab_device_uid , t1.lab_device_name , t1.approval_start_time , t1.approval_finish_time , t1.actual_start_time , t1.actual_finish_time , t1.attribute_01 , t1.attribute_02 , t1.attribute_03 , t1.attribute_04 , t1.attribute_05 , t1.attribute_06 , t1.attribute_07 , t1.attribute_08 , t1.attribute_09 , t1.attribute_10 , t1.attribute_11 , t1.attribute_12 , t1.attribute_13 , t1.attribute_14 , t1.attribute_15 , t1.attribute_16 , t1.attribute_17 , t1.attribute_18 , t1.attribute_19 , t1.attribute_20 , t1.attribute_21 , t1.attribute_22 , t1.attribute_23 , t1.attribute_24 , t1.attribute_25 , t1.attribute_26 , t1.attribute_27 , t1.attribute_28 , t1.attribute_29 , t1.attribute_30 from assets_lab_order t1 left join bpm_client_hist_procinst_v v on t1.id = v.formid_
and t1.ID =#{bean.id}
and t1.CREATED_BY like concat(concat('%',#{bean.createdBy}),'%')
and t1.CREATION_DATE like concat(concat('%',#{bean.creationDate}),'%')
and t1.LAST_UPDATED_BY like concat(concat('%',#{bean.lastUpdatedBy}),'%')
and t1.LAST_UPDATE_DATE like concat(concat('%',#{bean.lastUpdateDate}),'%')
and t1.LAST_UPDATE_IP like concat(concat('%',#{bean.lastUpdateIp}),'%')
and t1.VERSION like concat(concat('%',#{bean.version}),'%')
and t1.ORDER_NUMBER like concat(concat('%',#{bean.orderNumber}),'%')
and t1.APPLY_ID like concat(concat('%',#{bean.applyId}),'%')
and t1.APPLY_DEPT like concat(concat('%',#{bean.applyDept}),'%')
and t1.TELEPHONE like concat(concat('%',#{bean.telephone}),'%')
and t1.TDEVICE_NAME like concat(concat('%',#{bean.tdeviceName}),'%')
and t1.TDEVICE_CODE like concat(concat('%',#{bean.tdeviceCode}),'%')
and t1.TDEVICE_MODEL like concat(concat('%',#{bean.tdeviceModel}),'%')
and t1.TDEVICE_NUM like concat(concat('%',#{bean.tdeviceNum}),'%')
and t1.BELONG_MODEL like concat(concat('%',#{bean.belongModel}),'%')
and t1.TEST_TYPE like concat(concat('%',#{bean.testType}),'%')
and t1.TEST_NATURE like concat(concat('%',#{bean.testNature}),'%')
and t1.TEST_CONDITION like concat(concat('%',#{bean.testCondition}),'%')
and t1.SUPPORT_TOOL like concat(concat('%',#{bean.supportTool}),'%')
and t1.ORDER_START_TIME >= #{bean.orderStartTimeBegin}
and t1.ORDER_START_TIME <= #{bean.orderStartTimeEnd}
and t1.ORDER_FINISH_TIME >= #{bean.orderFinishTimeBegin}
and t1.ORDER_FINISH_TIME <= #{bean.orderFinishTimeEnd}
and t1.LAB_DEVICE_ID like concat(concat('%',#{bean.labDeviceId}),'%')
and t1.LAB_DEVICE_UID like concat(concat('%',#{bean.labDeviceUid}),'%')
and t1.LAB_DEVICE_NAME like concat(concat('%',#{bean.labDeviceName}),'%')
and t1.APPROVAL_START_TIME >= #{bean.approvalStartTimeBegin}
and t1.APPROVAL_START_TIME <= #{bean.approvalStartTimeEnd}
and t1.APPROVAL_FINISH_TIME >= #{bean.approvalFinishTimeBegin}
and t1.APPROVAL_FINISH_TIME <= #{bean.approvalFinishTimeEnd}
and t1.ACTUAL_START_TIME >= #{bean.actualStartTimeBegin}
and t1.ACTUAL_START_TIME <= #{bean.actualStartTimeEnd}
and t1.ACTUAL_FINISH_TIME >= #{bean.actualFinishTimeBegin}
and t1.ACTUAL_FINISH_TIME <= #{bean.actualFinishTimeEnd}
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_01 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute01}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_02 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute02}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_03 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute03}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_04 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute04}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_05 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute05}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_06 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute06}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_07 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute07}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_08 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute08}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_09 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute09}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_10 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute10}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_11 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute11}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_12 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute12}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_13 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute13}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_14 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute14}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_15 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute15}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_16 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute16}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_17 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute17}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_18 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute18}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_19 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute19}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_20 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute20}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_21 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute21}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_22 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute22}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_23 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute23}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_24 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute24}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_25 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute25}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_26 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute26}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_27 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute27}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_28 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute28}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_29 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute29}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_30 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute30}),'%')
and exists (select 1 from BPM_CLIENT_HIST_TASK_V os where os.task_b_id_ = t1.id and os.assignee_ = #{bean.currUserId})
and v.businessstate_ = #{bean.bpmState}
order by ${pOrderBy}
order by t1.creation_date desc
